channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server

item.title: CVE-2022-22443|2024-08-03T03:14:54.993Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 224440.

item.title: CVE-2022-22322|2024-08-03T03:07:50.206Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 218370.

item.title: CVE-2022-22373|2024-08-03T03:14:55.060Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: An improper validation vulnerability in IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 Pack for SAP Apps and BW Packs may lead to creation of directories and files on the server file system that may contain non-sensitive debugging information like stack traces. IBM X-Force ID: 221323.

item.title: CVE-2022-22454|2024-08-03T03:14:55.015Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a locally authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2022-22427|2024-08-03T03:14:55.045Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 223720.

item.title: CVE-2022-22441|2024-08-03T03:14:54.994Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to view information of higher privileged users and groups due to a privilege escalation vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 224426.

item.title: CVE-2022-31768|2024-08-03T07:26:01.196Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.

item.title: CVE-2023-33843|2024-08-02T15:54:12.696Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 256544.

item.title: CVE-2024-40689|2024-08-02T04:33:11.877Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 297719.

item.title: CVE-2024-31898|2024-08-02T01:59:50.480Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to read or modify sensitive information by bypassing authentication using insecure direct object references. IBM X-Force ID: 288182.

item.title: CVE-2024-31902|2024-08-02T01:59:50.069Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 289234.

item.title: CVE-2024-22352|2024-08-01T22:43:34.521Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 280361.

item.title: CVE-2024-40689|2024-07-26T13:27:26.097Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 297719.

item.title: CVE-2024-35119|2024-06-30T16:39:02.253Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in a stack trace. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 290342.

item.title: CVE-2023-50954|2024-06-30T16:40:59.263Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 returns sensitive information in URL information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275776.

item.title: CVE-2023-35022|2024-06-30T16:10:56.752Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a local user to update projects that they do not have the authorization to access. IBM X-Force ID: 258254.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated privileged user to obtain the absolute path of the web server installation which could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275777.
